t: Amazon & UPC Codes: All the Answers for Amazon Sellers – Webretailer.com
s: The company prefix identifies the manufacturer or brand owner of the product. This is used to create UPCs for your products. The ONLY place you can buy legitimate UPCs is through GS1. The problem with buying UPCs from resellers is that they are selling you someone else’s (hopefully unused) code.
